# Objectives

- Exploring MGnify Studies
- Exploring MGnify Analyses
- Metagenomic Assembled Genomes

Instructions
---------------

For this tutorial, you will need to start the predefined Jupyter notebook and complete the exercises within it.
follow the steps below To start the notebook.


1. Open this link on your browser: https://sa.ndyroge.rs/mgnify-tutorial/notebooks/index.html?path=tutorial.ipynb
2. Click on the run menu, then click run all cells
3. Go through the exercises in the notebook

NOTE: In regards to Task 3.3, take note of the following
---------------
A new marine MAG catalogue was recently published on MGnify.
When you get to task 3.3, make use of this MAG linked below:
[MGYG000445242](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/metagenomics/genomes/MGYG000445242)

If you're interested in learning more about the new marine MAG catalogue, you can find more information [here](https://ebi-metagenomics.github.io/blog/2024/08/08/Charting-New-Waters/)
